alert.note: Alert for Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 6:42PM MDT until July 23 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 642 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lamar, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lamar around 655 PM MDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
